metadata.title: CVE-2016-9139 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.3.x before 3.3.16, 4.0.x before 4.0.19, and 5.0.x before 5.0.14 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted attachment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-9139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 5.0.14-1
otrs2 - 5.0.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.14-1').
